name: Rescue The Kitty
description:
Your cat escaped again. But this time it put himself in trouble following evil creatures to their dungeon. Its cries guide you to the entrance. Will you succeed to save your lovely companion? Or will you focus on your own survival and escape? The choice is yours!

I made this game for the One Room Bitsy Jam. All the game takes place in one Bitsy room. There are 2 possible endings. I love how Bitsy makes it easy to build little funny stories!
